de.charite.compbio.jannovar.impl.intervals

Class IntervalArray<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.charite.compbio.jannovar.impl.intervals.IntervalArray<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class IntervalArray<T>
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Sorted array of Interval objects representing an immutable interval tree. The query results are sorted lexicographically by (begin, end).
    Author:
    Manuel Holtgrewe
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • findOverlappingWithPoint

        public IntervalArray.QueryResult findOverlappingWithPoint(int point)
        Query the encoded interval tree for all values with intervals overlapping with a given point.
        Parameters:
        point - zero-based point for the query
        Returns:
        the elements from the intervals overlapping with the point point

      • findOverlappingWithInterval

        public IntervalArray.QueryResult findOverlappingWithInterval(int begin,
                                                    int end)
        Query the encoded interval tree for all values with intervals overlapping with a given interval.
        Parameters:
        begin - zero-based begin position of the query interval
        end - zero-based end position of the query interval
        Returns:
        the elements from the intervals overlapping with the interval [begin, end)
